channel.title: Vista Admin Shell Icon
channel.description: In Windows Vista, one of the first things I do on a new machine is create an "Admin Shell".  The steps I do are as follows:- Copy the shortcut of your favorite command prompt (PowerShell or cmd.exe) Rename the shortcut "Admin Shell" or...
channel.dc:creator: Martin
